sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_email_6e378cb59795f110f4b03341f053afae
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>GetBusyLanes</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[(function runMailScript(/* GlideRecord */ current, /* TemplatePrinter */ template,
          /* Optional EmailOutbound */ email, /* Optional GlideRecord */ email_action,
          /* Optional GlideRecord */ event) {

          // Add your code here

var activeRequests = new GlideRecord('x_9053_car_wash_car_wash_request');
	var carWashJob = current.sys_id;
	var laneArray = [];
	//Query all of the car wash request records that are active
	activeRequests.addEncodedQuery('active=true^sys_id!=' + carWashJob);
	activeRequests.query();
	while(activeRequests.next()){
//Lane values from the car wash requests are added to a newly declared lane variable
	var lane = activeRequests.lane.getDisplayValue();
//We add all lanes to an array laneArray - if the lane value already exists then don't add them. If it does, then do add them.
	if(laneArray.indexOf(lane)==-1 && lane != ''){
	laneArray.push(lane);
	}
}
//Template.print returns the text to our email notification.
	template.print('Currently lanes ' + laneArray + ' are busy with other jobs.');





})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-15 22:36:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>6e378cb59795f110f4b03341f053afae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetBusyLanes</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Car Wash" source="x_9053_car_wash">91ecf48d97913110f4b03341f053af62</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Car Wash">91ecf48d97913110f4b03341f053af62</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_6e378cb59795f110f4b03341f053afae</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-15 22:37:05</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_push_notif_msg_content_22c97f299755f110f4b03341f053afb5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_push_notif_msg_content"><sys_push_notif_msg_content action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Car wash job assigned</name><push_app display_value="ServiceNow Request Application">ac7f61d273122300d63a566a4cf6a78b</push_app><script><![CDATA[(function buildJSON(/*GlideRecord*/ current, /*String*/ message, /*Object*/ attributes) {
//The mobile Deep Link generator provides the ability to add links on our mobile app

var carwashDeepLinkGenerator = new global.MobileDeepLinkGenerator("Request");

//The sys_id called is the sys_id for the mobile screen of the Car Wash Mobile App "Car wash record"
var carwashLink = carwashDeepLinkGenerator.getFormScreenLink('c088f65197dd7110f4b03341f053af4d',current.getTableName(),current.getValue("sys_id"));


//The layout generator provides a way of populating data from our existing record on the notification
var carwashLayoutGenerator = new global.NotificationLayoutFieldGenerator();
    var text_01 = 'Job assigned';
    var text_02 = carwashLayoutGenerator.layoutField(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id, "number");
    var text_03 = carwashLayoutGenerator.layoutField(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id, "car_type");

    var json = {
        "Link": carwashLink,
        "Layout": {
            "Status": text_01,
            "Identifier": text_02,
            "Description": text_03
        }
    };



 return json;

})(current, message, attributes);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-15 21:40:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>22c97f299755f110f4b03341f053afb5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Car wash job assigned</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Car Wash" source="x_9053_car_wash">91ecf48d97913110f4b03341f053af62</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Car Wash">91ecf48d97913110f4b03341f053af62</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content_22c97f299755f110f4b03341f053afb5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-15 22:06:23</sys_updated_on></sys_push_notif_msg_content></record_update>
